title: High ELO bashing in norms from players generally in gold and below
body:
So i'm a borderline diamond player and usually don't play rank when I have the casual ping spikes from my family. So what do I do if i'm not in ranked? Play normal games of course. But lately I'm extremely hesitant to even queue up into a normal game due to being dehumanized for not performing like a god. Isn't the normal game mode made so that anyone could have fun regardless of elo? It makes no sense to flame someone for not doing good enough, yes it is normal to flame someone if they're trolling, but come on, flaming someone because they can't carry 4 other people? not to mention League of Legends is a team game, not all games are won solely from a single person "carrying". It's even more disgusting the fact that most of the time the people who flame aren't even on my team since I play with a full premade (normally friends in silver-plat), so why not get the victory and keep it that way? You may argue "why not mute them?" yeah I would but the damage is already done when it's the first thing they'd ever say.

TLDR; 
-people in every elo even in challenger are still human, treat them the way you want to be treated.
-no I can't carry 3+ team mates that are behind just because my elo is higher than yours.
-I begin games with same base stats like everyone else, so don't expect us to do heaps of damage before 5 minutes.
-stop being toxic, no one likes that. If I wanted to be at the beach, I wouldn't be playing league.

ps. good luck to everyone for season 6.
